actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: To amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to exempt form its provisions fringe benefits offered in connection with a contract of employment.

summary.text: States that the authority of the President under the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 shall not be exercised to limit any fringe benefit offered in connection with a contract of employment. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 1904nt)

titles.title: To amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to exempt form its provisions fringe benefits offered in connection with a contract of employment.
